vatthu vasena pariyāyena siyāti
kathañca siyā
yam dukkha saccam akusala samudaya saccam akusala

original: evaṁ akusalaṭṭhena dve saccāni ekasaccena saṅgahitāni, ekasaccaṁ dvīhi saccehi saṅgahitaṁ.
analyzed: evam akusala ṭṭhena dve saccāni eka saccena saṅgahitāni eka saccam dvīhi saccehi
yam dukkha saccam kusala magga saccam kusala

original: evaṁ kusalaṭṭhena dve saccāni ekasaccena saṅgahitāni, ekasaccaṁ dvīhi saccehi saṅgahitaṁ.
analyzed: evam kusala ṭṭhena dve saccāni eka saccena saṅgahitāni eka saccam dvīhi saccehi

original: evaṁ abyākataṭṭhena dve saccāni ekasaccena saṅgahitāni, ekasaccaṁ dvīhi saccehi saṅgahitaṁ.

original: ‘ko nu kho rūpassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ;

original: ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ;
analyzed: kaḥ vedanāya assādaḥ kaḥ ādīnavaḥ kim nissaraṇa

original: ko saññāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ;

original: ko saṅkhārānaṁ assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇaṁ;

original: ko viññāṇassa assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṁ nissaraṇan’ti?
